faq.question: How do I book a home collection?
faq.answer: Booking a home collection with Diagnos Lab, in Jamshedpur is easy and convenient. You can schedule your appointment online through our website or by calling us directly at +91 8404802201/ 14.

faq.question: How long does it take to get the results?
faq.answer: At Diagnos Lab, we pride ourselves on delivering 99% of our reports on the same day with 100% accuracy through our advanced machines and daily quality control check.

faq.question: What safety measures are in place during sample collection?
faq.answer: Your safety is our top priority. Our trained phlebotomists use vacutainers instead of syringes to prevent hemolysis of samples. They follow strict hygiene protocols, and using sterilized equipment.
